> Fortuneteller threw her bolts.  "The one who brings
> light can stop him, as can the Matices.  There are
> many other vague paths to that end, but each perilous.
>  The best way is the Decepticon Matrix.  Unless, of
> course, you have others (OOC: Is there a Maximal or
> Predicon Matrix?).  But even so, you'd have two
> choices.  You can either mount a full-frontal assault,
> or you can get someone with precient abilities to pick
> out the path most likely to get you inside undetected,
> and open it from in there."
